GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4.66 to before v5.4.198
GSD.description:
HID: elan: Fix potential double free in elan_input_configured

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit f1d4f19a796551edc6679a681ea1756b8c578c08, it was introduced in version v5.4.66 by commit 82d4cfa185a93456c5c279b79f80af4f1319854c. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: HID: elan: Fix potential double free in elan_input_configured
